title.rendered: 5L – Eucoclean ‘Organic’ Anti-Bacterial Hospital Graded Hand Sanitiser

content.rendered:
How it works:

EucoClean Antibacterial Hand Sanitiser utilises an Organic Quaternary Salt Compound as an “Active Compound” to kill 99.99% of germs on contact. This “Active Compound” is approved and tested by the TGA.

Use On:

EucoClean Antibacterial Hand Sanitiser is formulated for sanitising hands, but the antibacterial action works on all hard and soft surfaces.

EucoClean Antibacterial Hand Sanitiser is a most effective antibacterial agent that kills 99.99% of germs on hands.

Application:

Rub liberally on the hands and allow to dry, reapply after washing hands or coming into contact with suspect surfaces. The formula is 100% biodegradable and completely safe to use on sensitive skin.

Safety:

EucoClean Antibacterial Hand Sanitiser is not a toxic substance to humans or animals and is for external application only. Do not use on sensitive skin areas such as the face or areas affected by an existing skin condition. If ingested drink water and seek medical advice. If the formula comes in contact with the eyes, irrigate eyes with water for 10 minutes and seek medical advice.
